channel.title: Reupload a client
channel.description: i really need help as no1 as been able to give me an answer.. i have dled a client and server. the client is messed up. say i have edited things ie - background. say it was black and now is white. i want them to upload the client that has the new white client background.. ? any help please?

item.title: Reupload a client
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

how i change the whole of client into a archive?

Read full topic

item.title: Reupload a client
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

You would go into client files and edit the background image then right click your client file then turn it in to a archive then upload it to mega-upload or whatever you choose and when they download the client the white background should show up

Read full topic
